original_title: Saber Rider and the Star Sheriffs: The Star Sheriff's Betrayal
overview: In the distant future, a team of four high tech Star Sheriffs defends frontier space colony Yuma from outlaws, as well as Outriders, an army of humanoid alien beings called Vapors, led by mysterious Nemesis, who need Yuma's resources.
title: Saber Rider and the Star Sheriffs: The Star Sheriff's Betrayal
